name: Solar Ascension
description:
Fast paced space shooter with flashy visuals and light danmaku element, redefining classic twin-stick shooter on mobile devices. Provides intuitive and smooth twin-stick control and enhanced with toggle-able auto-aim system.

Reach the best score to unlocks an arsenal of weapons, ships with unique abilities, and powerful power-ups.

Features :
🌠 Fight through 30 stages and test your skill at the endless stage.
🌠 3 upgradeable space ships with unique abilities, including Drill Missiles and Teleportation!
🌠 15 unlockable weapons, varying from homing missiles to chain-lightning gun!
🌠 10 'Devastator' Power-Ups. Provides instant power to devastate your enemies!
🌠 10 'Restorator' Power-Ups. Provides instant healing to keep you survive!
🌠 16 type of enemies with varying attacks. Plus one boss!
And more will be added with future updates!

Made by myself with Unity3D :)
